topics.body: Sometimes I remember when my friend group of nerds dragged our one fashionista, no-nonsense friend into a Hot Topic. And the fear in her eyes when she turned to me and said "Why are those girls yelling at the cartoons so loud?" And the confusion of the clerk when she asked where they kept the bucket hats. And I laugh.
